sentence.Network_en: Many of Polygonaceae are noxious weeds , some ornamentals , and buckwheat ( Fagopyrum ) and rhubarb ( Rheum ) foodstuffs .
sentence.Network_cn: 少数可食, 如 荞麦 和大黄;有一些是 观赏植物.

in polygonaceae , many chemical constitutents have effects of anti-tumor by diverse anti-tumor mechanisms , being extensive research and development prospects .摘要蓼科植物中的多种化学成分都有抗肿瘤作用，抗肿瘤机制比较多样，有广阔的研究及开发前景。

means.word_mean: 1. a family of plants of order Polygonales chiefly of the north temperate zone; includes the buckwheats
